thread.title: Win a De’Longhi coffee machine
thread.title_full: Win a De’Longhi coffee machine - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a De’Longhi coffee machine
text: If you’re serious about the quality of your coffee, then you’ll love De'Longhi’s Eletta machine – a bean-to-cup coffee maker that provides an unbeatable coffee experience for the perfect brew at home. With its patented automatic cappuccino system, milk-carafe and LatteCrema technology, you can make any type of coffee drink at the touch of a button, whether a cappuccino, caffè latte, latte macchiato or flat white. As a leader in the bean-to-cup and traditional pump espresso market, De'Longhi blends passion and attention to detail with the best technology so you can enjoy barista-style coffee from your own kitchen. Photo: Alice Whitby For a chance to win one of five De'Longhi Eletta machines and experience artisanal-style coffee at home, simply fill in the form below before midnight on Thursday 31 December 2015. Online Form - Win a De’Longhi coffee machine
